description.english: Play your first challenge in the Daily Challenges game mode.
description.german: Spiele deine erste Challenge im Spielmodus Tägliche Challenges.
description.french: Jouez à votre premier défi dans le mode de jeu Défis quotidiens.
description.italian: Gioca la tua prima sfida nella modalità di gioco Sfide giornaliere.
description.spanish: Juega tu primer desafío en el modo de juego Desafíos diarios.

description.english: Spend all of your available attempts in the Daily Challenges.
description.german: Verwende alle deine verfügbaren Versuche in den täglichen Challenges.
description.french: Utilisez tous vos essais quotidiens dans les défis quotidiens.
description.italian: Sfrutta ogni tentativo disponibile nella modalità Sfide giornaliere.
description.spanish: Gasta todos tus intentos disponibles en los desafíos diarios.

description.english: Earn 1,000,000,000 scores combined on the tables!
description.german: Erziele insgesamt 1.000.000.000 Punkte an den Tischen!
description.french: Gagnez 1 000 000 000 points combinés sur les plateaux.
description.italian: Ottieni 1.000.000.000 di punti complessivi sui tavoli!
description.spanish: ¡Consigue un total de 1 000 000 000 de puntos en las mesas!

description.english: Earn your first High Score!
description.german: Erziele deinen ersten Highscore!
description.french: Gagnez votre 1er high score !
description.italian: Ottieni il tuo primo record!
description.spanish: ¡Consigue tu primer récord!

description.english: Achieve 25 skillshots.
description.german: Erziele 25 Kunstschüsse.
description.french: Obtenez 25 Tirs précision.
description.italian: Ottieni 25 tiri d'abilità.
description.spanish: Haz 25 disp. de habilidad.

description.english: Level up your powerups in a total 20 times.
description.german: Stufe deine Powerups insgesamt 20 Mal hoch.
description.french: Augmentez vos Bonus 20 fois au total.
description.italian: Migliora i potenziamenti per 20 volte in totale.
description.spanish: Sube de nivel tus potenciadores 20 veces en total.

description.english: Level up any powerup on any table to level 10!
description.german: Erhöhe jedes Powerup an einem beliebigen Tisch auf Stufe 10!
description.french: Augmentez un Bonus au niveau 10 sur un plateau.
description.italian: Porta al livello 10 qualsiasi potenziamento su qualsiasi tavolo!
description.spanish: ¡Sube a 10 el nivel de un potenciador de cualquier mesa!

description.english: Max out all the powerups on the same table!
description.german: Maximiere alle Powerups am selben Tisch!
description.french: Maximisez tous les Bonus sur le même plateau.
description.italian: Porta al massimo tutti i potenziamenti di un tavolo!
description.spanish: ¡Maximiza todos los potenciadores de la misma mesa!

description.english: Complete your first campaign mission.
description.german: Schließe deine erste Kampagnenmission ab.
description.french: Terminez votre 1ère mission de campagne.
description.italian: Completa la tua prima missione Campagna.
description.spanish: Completa tu primera misión de campaña.

description.english: Unlock 3 different campaign rewards on any table!
description.german: Schalte 3 verschiedene Kampagnenpreise an einem Tisch frei!
description.french: Débloquez 3 récompenses de campagne sur n'importe quel plateau !
description.italian: Sblocca 3 ricompense campagna diverse su qualsiasi tavolo!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea 3 recompensas de campaña en cualquier mesa!

description.english: Earn all skulls from a campaign.
description.german: Verdiene alle Schädel in einer Kampagne.
description.french: Gagnez tous les crânes d'une campagne.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i teschi di una Campagna.
description.spanish: Logra todos los cráneos en una campaña.

description.english: Play 3 different challenges of any table!
description.german: Spiele 3 verschiedene Challenges an einem beliebigen Tisch!
description.french: Jouez à 3 défis différents sur un plateau.
description.italian: Gioca 3 diverse sfide su qualsiasi tavolo!
description.spanish: ¡Juega 3 desafíos distintos en cualquier mesa!

description.english: Play every challenge on the same table in singleplayer mode!
description.german: Spiele jede Challenge im Einzelspielermodus am selben Tisch!
description.french: Jouez à tous les défis sur le même plateau en mode solo.
description.italian: Gioca tutte le sfide sullo stesso tavolo in modalità Giocatore singolo!
description.spanish: ¡Juega todos los desafíos en la misma mesa en modo individual!

description.english: Unlock your first mastery level!
description.german: Schalte deine erste Meisterungsstufe frei!
description.french: Débloquez votre 1er niveau de maîtrise.
description.italian: Sblocca il tuo primo livello Padronanza!
description.spanish: Desbloquea tu primer nivel de maestría.

description.english: Reach maximum level from a mastery!
description.german: Erreiche die maximale Stufe einer Meisterung!
description.french: Atteignez le niveau max. d'une maîtrise.
description.italian: Ottieni il livello max. di una Padronanza!
description.spanish: ¡Alcanza el nivel máximo de una maestría!

description.english: Unlock 35 Pinball Mastery levels in total!
description.german: Schalte insgesamt 35 Flipper-Meisterungsstufen frei!
description.french: Débloquez 35 niveaux de maîtrise de flipper.
description.italian: Sblocca 35 livelli Padronanza Pinball complessivi!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea 35 niveles de maestría de pinball!

description.english: Unlock 25 tournament mastery levels.
description.german: Schalte 25 Turnier-Meisterungsstufen frei.
description.french: Débloquez 25 niveaux de maîtrise de tournoi.
description.italian: Sblocca 25 livelli Padronanza torneo.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 25 niv. de maestría de torneos.

description.english: Unlock 25 daily challenges mastery levels.
description.german: Schalte 25 Tägliche-Challenges-Meisterungsstufen frei.
description.french: Débloquez 25 niveaux de maîtrise Défis quotidiens.
description.italian: Sblocca 25 livelli di maestria delle sfide giorn.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 25 niveles de maestría de desafíos d.

description.english: Unlock 25 table mastery levels.
description.german: Schalte 25 Tisch-Meisterungsstufen frei.
description.french: Débloquez 25 niveaux maîtrise plateau.
description.italian: Sblocca 25 livelli Padronanza tavolo.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 25 niv. maestría de mesas.

description.english: Highlight a tournament with your spotlight!
description.german: Hebe ein Turnier mit deinem Spotlight hervor!
description.french: Mettez un tournoi en vedette avec votre Spotlight.
description.italian: Metti in evidenza un torneo con i tuoi riflettori!
description.spanish: ¡Destaca un torneo con tu foco!

description.english: Create your own Tournament.
description.german: Erstelle dein eigenes Turnier.
description.french: Créez votre propre tournoi.
description.italian: Crea il tuo torneo.
description.spanish: Crea tu propio torneo.

description.english: Post a score in a tournament!
description.german: Poste ein Ergebnis in einem Turnier!
description.french: Publiez un score dans un tournoi.
description.italian: Pubblica un punteggio in un torneo!
description.spanish: ¡Publica puntuación en un torneo!

description.english: Win a tournament game with at least 10 players.
description.german: Gewinne ein Turnierspiel mit mindestens 10 Spielern.
description.french: Gagnez une partie de tournoi avec au moins 10 joueurs.
description.italian: Vinci una partita di un torneo con almeno 10 giocatori.
description.spanish: Gana una partida de torneo con al menos 10 jugadores.

description.english: Customize one of your tables or play corners for the first time.
description.german: Passe einen deiner Tische oder eine Spielecke zum ersten Mal an.
description.french: Personnalisez un de vos plateaux ou espaces de jeu pour la première fois.
description.italian: Personalizza uno dei tavoli o degli angoli di gioco per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Personaliza una de tus mesas o rincones de juego por primera vez.

description.english: Unlock all play corner and table customization item of a same table!
description.german: Schalte alle Spielecke- und Tischanpassungsgegenstände desselben Tischs frei!
description.french: Débloquez tous les objets de l'Espace de jeu et de personnalisation d'un même plateau !
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le personalizzazioni tavolo e Angolo di gioco per lo stesso tavolo!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea todos los elementos de personalización de rincón y mesa de una mesa!

description.english: Spend your unlock tokens for the first time.
description.german: Gib zum ersten Mal deine Freischalt-Tokens aus.
description.french: Utilisez vos jetons à débloquer pour la première fois.
description.italian: Spendi i gettoni sblocco per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Gasta tus fichas de desbloqueo por primera vez.

description.english: Reach level 50.
description.german: Erreiche Stufe 50.
description.french: Atteignez niv. 50.
description.italian: Arriva al livello. 50.
description.spanish: Llega al nivel 50.

description.english: Reach level 100.
description.german: Erreiche Stufe 100.
description.french: Atteignez niv. 100.
description.italian: Sblocca 50 diversi banner di personalizzazione.
description.spanish: Llega al nivel 100.

description.english: Unlock 50 different banner customization.
description.german: Schalte 50 verschiedene Banneranpassungen frei.
description.french: Débloquez 50 personnalisations de bannière.
description.italian: Sblocca 50 diversi banner di personalizzazione.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 50 elementos de personaliz. de banner.

description.english: Customize all slots of your profile banner.
description.german: Passe alle Slots deines Profilbanners an.
description.french: Personnalisez tous les slots de la bannière profil.
description.italian: Personalizza tutti gli slot del tuo banner profilo.
description.spanish: Personaliza todos los espacios de banner de perfil.

description.english: Equip 3 level 5 mastery badges at the same time.
description.german: Rüste 3 Meisterungsabzeichen der Stufe 5 zur gleichen Zeit aus.
description.french: Équipez 3 badges de maîtrise niveau 5 en même temps.
description.italian: Equipaggia 3 badge di Padronanza di livello 5 insieme.
description.spanish: Equipa 3 insignias de maestría de nivel 5 a la vez.

description.english: Equip Queen of Spades and Sunset Portal on your banner at the same time.
description.german: Setze Pik-Dame und Sonnenuntergangsportal gleichzeitig auf dein Banner.
description.french: Équipez la Dame de pique et le Portail du crépuscule sur votre bannière en même temps.
description.italian: Equipaggia Regina di picche e Portale del tramonto sul tuo banner insieme.
description.spanish: Equipa Reina de picas y Portal del atardecer en tu banner a la vez.

description.english: Complete the ultimate test on the Wrath of the Elder Gods table.
description.german: Bestehe den ultimativen Test am Tisch Wrath of the Elder Gods.
description.french: Complétez le test ultime sur le plateau Wrath of the Elder Gods.
description.italian: Completa la sfida definitiva sul tavolo Wrath of the Elder Gods.
description.spanish: Completa la prueba suprema en la mesa Wrath of the Elder Gods.

description.english: Kill 10 real Spawns on the Wrath of the Elder Gods table.
description.german: Töte 10 reale Ableger am Tisch Wrath of the Elder Gods.
description.french: Tuez 10 véritables Rejetons sur le plateau Wrath of the Elder Gods.
description.italian: Uccidi 10 suoi Discendenti reali sul tavolo Wrath of the Elder Gods.
description.spanish: Mata 10 vástagos reales en la mesa Wrath of the Elder Gods.

description.english: Go fully mad on the Wrath of the Elder Gods table.
description.german: Werde vollkommen wahnsinnig am Tisch Wrath of the Elder Gods.
description.french: Sombrez dans la folie complète sur le plateau Wrath of the Elder Gods.
description.italian: Impazzisci completamente sul tavolo Wrath of the Elder Gods.
description.spanish: Alcanza la locura total en la mesa Wrath of the Elder Gods.

description.english: Use all weapons to kill the first 4 bosses on Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball!
description.german: Erlege die ersten 4 Bosse in Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball mit allen Waffen!
description.french: Vainquez les 4 premiers boss dans Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball avec chaque arme !
description.italian: Usa tutte le armi per uccidere i primi 4 boss su Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball!
description.spanish: Usa todas las armas para vencer a los 4 jefes en Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball.

description.english: Get a super jackpot in "Shake it, baby!" on Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball!
description.german: Erhalten Sie im "Shake it, baby!" bei Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball einen Super-Jackpot!
description.french: Gagnez un super jackpot avec Vas-y, bébé ! dans Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball !
description.italian: Conquista un super jackpot in "Balla, baby!" su Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball!
description.spanish: ¡Obtén un super jackpot en "¡Menéalo, nena!" en Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball!

description.english: Start "Ready for Action" with 6 balls on Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball!
description.german: Beginne "Bereit für Action" mit 6 Kugeln auf Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball!
description.french: Démarrez Toujours prêt avec 6 billes sur Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball !
description.italian: Inizia "Pronti all'azione" con 6 palline su Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball!
description.spanish: ¡Comienza "Listo para la acción" con 6 bolas en Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball!

description.english: Decapitate Chucky in the wizard mode of the Chucky's Killer Pinball table.
description.german: Enthaupte Chucky im Wizard-Modus des Tischs Chucky's Killer Pinball.
description.french: Décapitez Chucky dans le mode Wizard sur le plateau Chucky's Killer Pinball.
description.italian: Decapita Chucky in modalità wizard nel tavolo Chucky's Killer Pinball.
description.spanish: Decapita a Chucky en el modo de mago de la mesa Chucky's Killer Pinball.

description.english: Stab Chucky in the Slasher Multiball mode of the Chucky's Killer Pinball table.
description.german: Stich Chucky im Schlitzer-Multiball-Modus des Tischs Chucky's Killer Pinball.
description.french: Poignardez Chucky dans le mode Multibille Slasher sur Chucky's Killer Pinball.
description.italian: Pugnala Chucky nella modalità Multiball slasher in Chucky's Killer Pinball.
description.spanish: Apuñala a Chucky en el modo multibola Slasher de la mesa Chucky's Killer Pinball.

displayName.english: I'm your friend to the end
displayName.german: Ich bin dein Freund bis zum Ende
displayName.french: Je serai ton ami pour toujours
displayName.spanish: Seré tu amigo hasta el final

description.english: Be a perfect Good Guy in the Dolls mode of the Chucky's Killer Pinball table.
description.german: Sei ein perfekter Good Guy im Puppen-Modus des Tischs Chucky's Killer Pinball.
description.french: Soyez un Good Guy idéal dans le mode Poupées sur Chucky's Killer Pinball.
description.italian: Sii la Good Guy perfetta nella modalità Bambole in Chucky's Killer Pinball.
description.spanish: Sé un Good Guy perfecto en el modo Muñecos de la mesa Chucky's Killer Pinball.

description.english: Pass 5 Skill Checks in a row on the Dead by Daylight™ Pinball table.
description.german: Bestehe 5 Skill Checks in Folge am Tisch Dead by Daylight™ Pinball.
description.french: Réussissez 5 Jets de compétence d'affilée sur Dead by Daylight™ Pinball.
description.italian: Supera 5 Controlli di abilità consecutivi sul tavolo Dead by Daylight™ Pinball.
description.spanish: Supera 5 pruebas de habilidad seguidas en la mesa Dead by Daylight™ Pinball.

description.english: Hit a trapped Survivor on the Dead by Daylight™ Pinball table.
description.german: Triff einen gefangenen Überlebenden am Tisch Dead by Daylight™ Pinball.
description.french: Touchez un Survivant pris au piège sur Dead by Daylight™ Pinball.
description.italian: Colpisci un Superstite in trappola sul tavolo Dead by Daylight™ Pinball.
description.spanish: Golpea a un superviviente atrapado en la mesa Dead by Daylight™ Pinball.

description.english: Drop the Pallet for at least 1 million points on the Dead by Daylight™ Pinball table.
description.german: Stürze die Palette um für mind. 1 Million Punkte am Tisch Dead by Daylight™ Pinball.
description.french: Faites tomber la Palette pour 1 million de pts sur Dead by Daylight™ Pinball.
description.italian: Fai cadere un Bancale e ottieni 1 mln di punti sul tavolo Dead by Daylight™ Pinball.
description.spanish: Obtén 1 millón de puntos o más con el palé en la mesa Dead by Daylight™ Pinball.

displayName.english: Man is the warmest place to hide
displayName.german: Ein Mensch ist das wärmste Versteck
displayName.italian: L'uomo è il rifugio più caldo

description.english: Complete the Wizard mode on the Thing Pinball.
description.german: Absolviere den Wizard-Modus von The Thing Pinball.
description.french: Terminez le mode Wizard sur le plateau The Thing Pinball.
description.italian: Completa la modalità wizard in The Thing Pinball.
description.spanish: Completa el modo de mago en The Thing Pinball.

displayName.english: That Thing wanted to be us
displayName.german: Das Ding wollte zu uns werden
displayName.italian: La Cosa voleva essere come noi

description.english: Play the Assimilation Video Mode on the Thing Pinball.
description.german: Spiele den Assimilierung-Videomodus von The Thing Pinball.
description.french: Jouez au mode vidéo Assimilation sur le plateau The Thing Pinball.
description.italian: Gioca la modalità video Assimilazione in The Thing Pinball.
description.spanish: Juega al modo de vídeo Asimilación en The Thing Pinball.

description.english: Start the Whiteout side mode on the Thing Pinball.
description.german: Starte den Whiteout-Nebenmodus von The Thing Pinball.
description.french: Démarrez le mode secondaire Frénésie blanche sur le plateau The Thing Pinball.
description.italian: Avvia la modalità secondaria Frenesia abbacinante in The Thing Pinball.
description.spanish: Inicia el modo secundario Ventisca en The Thing Pinball.

description.english: Defeat SHODAN in the final Cyberspace battle on the System Shock Pinball table.
description.german: Besiege SHODAN im finalen Cyberspace-Kampf am Tisch System Shock Pinball.
description.french: Battez SHODAN dans l'ultime combat Cyberespace du plateau System Shock Pinball.
description.italian: Sconfiggi SHODAN nella battaglia finale sul tavolo System Shock Pinball.
description.spanish: Derrota a SHODAN en la batalla en el ciberespacio en la mesa System Shock Pinball.

description.english: Collect all self-destruct code digits on the System Shock Pinball table.
description.german: Sammle alle Ziffern des Selbstzerstörungscodes am Tisch System Shock Pinball.
description.french: Obtenez tous les chiffres du code du réacteur du plateau System Shock Pinball.
description.italian: Ottieni ogni cifra del codice del reattore sul tavolo System Shock Pinball.
description.spanish: Consigue todo el código de autodestrucción en la mesa System Shock Pinball.

description.english: More than 2 cyborgs have been eliminated on the System Shock Pinball table.
description.german: Eliminiere mindestens 3 Cyborgs am Tisch System Shock Pinball.
description.french: Éliminez au moins 3 cyborgs du plateau System Shock Pinball.
description.italian: Elimina almeno 3 cyborg sul tavolo System Shock Pinball.
description.spanish: Elimina al menos 3 cíborgs en la mesa System Shock Pinball.

description.english: Complete the final mode against Lila and Melody on the Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball table.
description.german: Absolviere den letzten Modus gegen Lila und Melody am Tisch Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball
description.french: Terminez le dernier mode contre Lila et Melody sur le plateau Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball.
description.italian: Completa la modalità finale contro Lila e Melody nel tavolo Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball.
description.spanish: Completa el modo final contra Lila y Melody en la mesa Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball.

displayName.french: Bain de sang dans le bus
displayName.spanish: Baño de sangre en el autobús

description.english: Start the Bloodbath in the Bus multiball mode on the Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball table.
description.german: Starte den Blutbad-im-Bus-Multiball-Modus am Tisch Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball
description.french: Démarrez le mode Multibille Bain de sang dans le bus sur le plateau Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball.
description.italian: Avvia la modalità multiball Carneficina sull'autobus nel tavolo Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball.
description.spanish: Inicia el modo multibola Baño de sangre en el autobús en la mesa Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball.

description.english: Score a Super Skillshot on the Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball table.
description.german: Erziele einen Super-Kunstschuss am Tisch Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball
description.french: Marquez un Super Tir de précision sur le plateau Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball.
description.italian: Esegui un super tiro d'abilità nel tavolo Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball.
description.spanish: Consigue un superdisparo de habilidad en la mesa Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball.

description.english: Complete a main mode on Camp Bloodbrook.
description.german: Absolviere einen Hauptmodus am Tisch Camp Bloodbrook.
description.french: Terminez un mode principal sur Camp Bloodbrook.
description.italian: Completa una modalità principale sul tavolo Camp Bloodbrook.
description.spanish: Completa un modo principal en Camp Bloodbrook.

description.english: Complete all Camp Trials on Camp Bloodbrook.
description.german: Absolviere alle Camp-Prüfungen am Tisch Camp Bloodbrook.
description.french: Terminez toutes les Épreuves de campement sur Camp Bloodbrook.
description.italian: Completa tutte le Prove del campo sul tavolo Camp Bloodbrook.
description.spanish: Completa todas las pruebas del campamento en Camp Bloodbrook.

description.english: Start the Storm side mode on Camp Bloodbrook.
description.german: Starte den Sturm-Nebenmodus am Tisch Camp Bloodbrook.
description.french: Démarrez le mode secondaire Tempête sur Camp Bloodbrook.
description.italian: Avvia la modalità secondaria Frenesia tempestosa sul tavolo Camp Bloodbrook.
description.spanish: Inicia el modo secundario Tormenta en Camp Bloodbrook.
